price: 81. Il vous fait voir Ses Signes, et quels Signes d’Allah nierez-vous ?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayurīkum āyātihi fa-ayya āyāti al-lahi tunkirūna
